Detailed Description

Critical section class.

This class CAN handle recursive locks.

Definition at line 316 of file ISABThread.h.

Member Function Documentation

void ISABRecursiveMutex::lock (   )  const [inline]
 

Locks the mutex.

If the mutex is already locked, the calling thread blocks until the mutex is unlocked.

Definition at line 607 of file ISABThread.h.

void ISABRecursiveMutex::unlock (   )  const [inline]
 

Unlocks the mutex.

This function is called by the owner of the mutex's lock to release it.
